Description:
Singarea Asian Foodstuff Company imports food products from East Asia, and distributes to Restaurants, Hotels, Supermarkets, Hypermarkets all over Kuwait. It runs 3 branches of retail showrooms in Kuwait.Working on Sales strategy to boost up company sales
Bringing in new customers by representing the company
Sustaining a constant sales to existing customersSkills
Skills:
Arabic Nationality (also should speak English)
Experience in working as a salesman
Requirement: Visa 18 Transferrable
